<div class="treeview"><onlyinclude>
** {{nbt|compound|minecraft:angry_at}}: The target of this piglin brute. Set after a piglin or piglin brute is attacked.
***{{nbt|int-array|value}}: [[Universally Unique IDentifier]] of the entity that the piglin targets, stored as four ints.
***{{nbt|long|ttl}}: The number of game ticks before this memory is removed.
** {{nbt|compound|minecraft:home}}: Where the piglin brute's patrol point is. Set after spawning as part of a bastion remnant during world generation. Piglin brutes will limit their pathfinding to stay within this area.
*** {{nbt|compound|value}}: The value of this memory.
**** {{nbt|string|dimension}}: The dimension ID of the patrol point.
**** {{nbt|int-array|pos}}: The X, Y, and Z coordinates of the patrol point.
</onlyinclude></div><noinclude>

</noinclude>
